name: Infinite Room (Edalbung)
description:
Is it really infinite?

Controls:

Keyboard and Gamepad are supported - Inputs ->

  • Walk -> WASD (ZQSD) / Left Stick
  • Camera -> IJKL / Mouse / Right Stick
  • Interact -> E / Left Click / West Button (X button / Square button)
  • Sprint -> LShift / Right Bumper (R1)

Credits:

- Assets - Kenney -> https://www.kenney.nl/assets/furniture-kit

- SFX - Sonniss -> https://sonniss.com/gameaudiogdc

- Music - Chris Logsdon -> https://chrislsound.itch.io/ambient-puzzle
